hero.title: Community-Based Conservation
hero.subtitle: Empowering local communities to protect the Philippine crocodile and preserve vital habitats.

sections.title: Conservation with the People
sections.text: The Mabuwaya Foundation works hand-in-hand with local communities in San Mariano, Isabela. Through education, sustainable livelihood programs, and conservation agreements, we empower people to become stewards of their environment.

sections.title: Protecting the Philippine Crocodile
sections.text: By involving farmers, fisherfolk, and indigenous people, our community-based conservation programs safeguard the critically endangered Philippine crocodile while improving the lives of local residents.

cta.title: Join Our Conservation Efforts
cta.text: Your support helps us build stronger communities and protect endangered species. Together, we can make a lasting impact.
